episode.summary: The Phantom Knight uses the Hell Ring to multiply his strength. After being surrounded by Mist Flames, he appears in an unexpected form and displays his dark powers. But Tsuna fearlessly sets out to use his secret technique--a flame attack with force never seen before—the X Burner Hyper Explosion!! The flames clash. Who will win the battle?! And what was beyond the wall that was destroyed by the fierce clash of power? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 明かされる真実
Revealed Truth
Akasareru Shinjitsu
episode.summary: Tsuna finally arrives at his destination—Shoichi Irie`s laboratory. As Tsuna stares at the round white device, Shoichi Irie himself appears before him. Irie shows him the Guardians he captured and the Vongola Rings he has gathered. Gokudera yells out to Tsuna, telling him not to worry about him and the other Guardians and to destroy the device. But Irie opens up the mysterious round white device. Tsuna and his friends are shocked at what was hidden. The time finally comes for Irie to tell the truth… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタリア主力戦
Main Battle in Italy
Italia Shuryokusen
episode.summary: The Vongola family has launched simultaneous attacks against the Millefiore Family across the world. Naturally, the Varia, the Vongola`s independent assassination squad, is also participating. The Varia of the future quickly occupy the Millefiore base, where they are surrounded by the Millefiore forces. But the members, Lussuria, Levi, Bel, Squalo, and a quirky newcomer, Flan, are not patient enough to play defense. The Varia of the future go on the move under the command of Squalo, their chief of operations! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双子の王子
Twin Princes
Futago no Ouji
episode.summary: The last of the Six Funeral Wreaths is Bel`s twin brother, whom Bel supposedly killed. Bel suspects that Sil is an illusion, but he has to acknowledge that he is real when Sil shows him the birthmark that matches his own, as well as the scar that Bel gave him. Bel talks to the brother he was never supposed to meet again about the time Bel attacked him when he was little. Why is someone who is not supposed to exist alive? Irie at Melone Base says that it has something to do with Byakuran`s ability, but he keeps quiet about the details… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒りの咆哮
Furious Roar
Ikari no Houkou
episode.summary: Sil and his butler, Orgelt, destroy the old castle that the Varia are occupying. Sil is pleased that he easily dealt with the Varia all at once. But in one of the rooms of the destroyed castle, future Xanxus is sitting in a chair unharmed. Xanxus provokes his enemies by yawning in front of them. Orgelt attacks with his Elefante Forte Pioggia, but Xanxus smashes the elephant into pieces with a single powerful blow! Is the giant animal hidden behind Xanxus his box weapon?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もう一つの大空
Another Sky
Mouhitotsu no Oozora
episode.summary: Xanxus`s box weapon is the Sky Storm Liger: Ligre Tempesta di Cielo, which has the attributes of both Sky and Storm. Xanxus closes his box and orders Sil to call Byakuran. Sil hints that he`s open to negotiating, but he is actually buying himself time to attack Xanxus, who is not using a box weapon at the moment. Sil uses his box weapon, Storm Bat: Pipistrello Tempesta, to surround Xanxus, and plans to attack him with special invisible storm flames. But in the next moment, the Storm Bat is crushed by a beam of light! It is Xanxus`s flames of rage which were fired from his twin pistols. Even without his box weapon, Xanxus`s fighting power is unfathomable! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再会
Reunion
Saikai
episode.summary: Tsuna receives the Vongola Box from Irie. However, Irie shockingly tells him that in order to draw out the true power of the Vongola Rings and open the Vongola Box, the Seven Arcobaleno Seals are needed. In order to obtain the seals, Tsuna needs to overcome the Arcobaleno trials. However, in the future all of the Arcobaleno, besides Reborn, are dead. Tsuna doesn’t know what to do. Irie says that he`ll momentarily send Tsuna and his friends into the past so that they can retrieve the seals. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強の7人
The Strongest Seven
Saikyou no 7 Nin
episode.summary: Back in the past, the Arcobaleno are heading to Namimori to present Tsuna with their trials. Meanwhile, in the future, Irie is giving Tsuna and his friends instructions on how to return to the past. The Arcobaleno Trials are a week long. If they don`t get all seven seals during that time, they will lose all means to oppose Byakuran. With a newfound determination, Tsuna and his friends return to the Namimori of the past using Irie`s device. Tsuna and his friends are thrilled to see a peaceful Namimori. Reborn, previously silent, finally announces the start of the Arcobaleno Trials… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第一の試練
Trial #1
Daiichi no Shirente
episode.summary: One day has passed since Tsuna and his friends had returned to the past and they still have yet to receive a trial. Reborn says he doesn`t know what order the Arcobaleno will appear. Tsuna suggests they should go to school and do as they would usually do. However, during recess they are suddenly attacked on the roof! It is a baby with goggles. It’s Lal Mirch. Lal says that she is the observer to the Arcobaleno Trials. Their first opponent is Colonnello, who has a blue pacifier. Colonnello begins Tsuna and Gokudera`s trial to test their combat abilities--! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守護者対決! 雲と霧
Guardian Showdown! Cloud and Mist
Shugosha Taiketsu! Kumo to Kiri
episode.summary: Concern for Chrome brings Tsuna to Kokuyo Health Land. Hibari and Mukuro suddenly show up. The longstanding grudge between the two comes to a boil as soon as their eyes meet and they begin to fight! Tsuna can’t figure out what to do. It seems this unlikely situation was created by Skull, the Arcobaleno with the purple pacifier. At this rate, Hibari and Mukuro will continue to fight until one of them falls. Tsuna becomes panicked when Lal tells him that his trial has begun. On one side, there`s Skull`s trial and on the other side, Hibari and Mukuro are in fierce combat. Furthermore, Ken and Chikusa show up after noticing the chaos. It`s mayhem! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アルコバレーノの印
The Arcobaleno Seals
Arcobaleno no Fuuin
episode.summary: Colonnello shows off his overwhelming strength. It is a tough fight even for Tsuna and his friends who had gotten stronger through training and fighting in the future. Colonello repeatedly strikes with his powerful punches, kicks, and his killer “Maximum Burst”! Barely able to catch his breath dodging the attacks, Tsuna can’t use his X Burner. However, Gokudera’s cleverness allows them a little bit of time to fire up the X Burner. Tsuna’s X Burner and Colonello’s Maximum Burst are used at the same time—which one will ultimately win….!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リボーンの試験
Reborn`s Examination
Reborn no Shiken
episode.summary: At last, the day of Reborn’s trial rolls around. Reborn tells them to bring all of the guardians to Namimori Island and then leaves. Tsuna notices that Reborn isn’t his usual self, and Tsuna can’t hide his confusion. When Tsuna and the others arrive at the assigned destination, Reborn tells everyone they are to fight him to the death. Reborn mercilessly kicks Tsuna who says he can’t fight him. Even when Tsuna falls unconscious, Reborn commands the other guardians to continue fighting him without regard for the fallen Tsuna. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大空を継ぐ二人
The Two Who Inherit the Heavens
Oozora o Tsugu Futari
episode.summary: There are three remaining Arcobaleno tests, one of which is the sky Arcobaleno. Tsuna resembles the Arcobaleno and thus takes an interest in them, but Reborn tells him that the sky Arcobaleno has been missing for quite a while. So how will the sky Arcobaleno test be carried out? Just then, an unknown woman comes to Tsuna’s house with Kyoko and Haru, carrying the orange pacifier. The mystery grows when the woman asks Tsuna to take her, along with Kyoko and Haru, on a tour around Namimori. Does this have anything to do with the tests? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風をつかまえろ
Catching the Wind
Kaze o Tsukamaeru
episode.summary: Tsuna receives a letter. Inside the letter, there is a photo of someone wearing sunglasses and a note that reads “Try and catch me.” I-Pin sees the photo and is in shock. Reborn says that the person in the photo is I-Pin’s master, Fon, the holder of the red pacifier of the Arcobaleno. I-Pin wants to help Tsuna, but cannot help but is clearly hesitant to capture someone to whom he pledged his loyalty. Perceiving that I-Pin felt that way, Tsuna takes off by himself for the test. The test with Fon is a game of tag. Will Tsuna be able to catch the swift Bushido master? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 匣(ボックス)兵器プロトタイプ
Box Weapon Prototype
Box Heiki Prototype
episode.summary: A fog-draped morning, Tsuna is called out to Nami Junior High (?) by a mysterious phone call. On the way there, he runs into Yamamoto, Ryohei, and Gokudera. It turns out that Gokudera had come looking for Tsuna, but Yamamoto and Ryohei had been called out by the same kind of mysterious phone call. Is this one of the Arcobaleno’s tests…? They await suspiciously, and before them, Mammon—or Viper—of the Arcobaleno appears. Mammon says he has taken Kyoko hostage. Regardless of Tsuna and the others’ distraught faces, Mammom coldly kicks off a new mystery-solving game. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 閉ざされた道
Closed Path
Tozasareta Michi
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends are told that they did not pass Reborn’s test. If they don’t collect all seven seals of the Arcobaleno, they can’t open the Vongola box. Without the Vongola box, they would lose all means of fighting Byakuran. Will they be given a second chance? Or has the future been closed off to them? Tsuna and his friends are upset, but they somehow muster up the energy to ask Reborn for a second shot. Reborn goes silent upon being asked. But just then, weapons fire and explosives detonate. The last Arcobaleno, Verde appears! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 虹のそろう時
When a Rainbow Forms
Niji no Sorou Toki
episode.summary: Verde attacks Tsuna and his friends with a weapon of his own invention. They fight back with all their might, but their wounds from Reborn’s test are still fresh, and they are not as powerful as usual. Verde’s intention was to attack Tsuna and his friends while they were weak so that he could steal the Vongola Ring. And this wasn’t just a test. Tsuna and his friends fight back desperately, and Reborn says he and the rest of the Arcobaleno will join in on the fight. As though to add insult to injury, Verde comes after them with a still unfinished box weapon. He even goes after Hibari and Lambo who have returned to Namimori. The Arcobaleno makes a move to help Tsuna and his friends….! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボスの覚悟
The Boss` Resolution
Boss no Kakuko
episode.summary: Verde takes Reborn and the Arcobaleno hostage and demands Tsuna to hand over the Vongola Ring. But the future depends on the Vongola Ring. Tsuna and his friends refuse to hand it over, and they head for the unfinished box weapon in order to save Reborn and the Arcobaleno. While watching them struggle against the weapon, Verde is more than ever captivated by the power of the Deathperation Flame. Verde summons forth a new device and activates it. At that instant, Tsuna, Gokudera, Yamamoto, and Hibari feel a kind of magnetic force. However, the other guardians don’t feel a thing. What in the world is this device for…? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の印
The Last Mark
Saigo no Shirushi
episode.summary: It turns out that Verde, this whole time, was not actually Verde, but a robot!? Then where is the real Verde? If they don’t find him, they can’t get his seal. What`s more, the real Verde may be plotting yet another attack. Verde himself might not even be hiding within the limits of Namimori. The guardians are overcome with fear. Just then, Tsuna’s hyper senses detect something. Time is running out before they have to return to the future. Will Tsuna and his friends be able to collect all of the seals before time runs out? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 次なる戦いへ
To the Next Battle
Tsuginaru Tatakai e
episode.summary: Since being flown to the future and brought to the Merone Base, they have fought in many battles. Ultimately, Tsuna, who has defeated his nemesis, the Phantom Knight, comes across a white and round device. The astonishing truth that Irie informed them about awaits them there. The battle at the Merone Base comes to an end at the moment, and Tsuna passes another test, thereby acquiring the power to open the Vongola Box. However, whether he’ll be able to use it well all depends on his next training session. His next goal is to defeat Byakuran…! They venture off to their next battle to bring back peace and return to Namimori of 10 years earlier. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真(リアル)6弔花
The Real Six Funeral Wreaths
Real 6 Chouka
episode.summary: The Varia win the main battle in Italy, and all that is left is to defeat the boss, Byakuraun. While Tsuna and his friends are in high spirits, Byakuran sends a message via hologram as though to mock them. In a confident tone, Byakuran asks for a formal measuring of the Vongola’s strength against the Millefiore. However, the Millefiore’s main force has already been defeated by Tsuna and his friends at the Merone Base. Irie is having trouble recognizing his true intentions when her Mare ring breaks! And then a new enemy appears before Tsuna and his friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間のために
For My Friends
Nakama no Tame ni
episode.summary: The fight against Byakuran is approaching, and yet Yamamoto is nonchalant as usual. Gokudera sees this and can’t hide his annoyance. However, Yamamoto seems to have a plan of his own. Everyone learns from the newspaper that there will be a district baseball competition at Namimori Middle School. According to Kusakabe, Namimori Middle School’s baseball team of this time period is too wild, and the team is on the verge of being discontinued. Yamamoto hears this and his expression turns gloomy. A short while later, Yamamoto disappears from the base. He is worried about the baseball team and has gone to the school. Gokudera is angry, but what exactly is Yamamoto’s intention…? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 機動力を手に入れろ
Gaining Mobility
Kidouryoku o Te ni Ireru
episode.summary: Irie explains the rules of the game, Choice, to Tsuna and the crew. It is a war game in which one gets to choose opponents and battlefields. The winner gets to take one thing from the loser’s belongings. Irie and Byakuran originally came up with Choice as a board game during their college days, and it has since then developed into a computer game. But how exactly is the computer game played? There are still a lot of things that are unclear. However, what is known at this stage is that they will need the ability to move about large battlefields. According to Reborn’s plan, Giannini and Spanner face off for the first time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あたたかい場所
A Warm Place
Atatakai Basho
episode.summary: Kyoko and Haru are worried about Chrome, who has not come out of her room to eat. Bianchi says that Chrome just doesn’t know how to respond to the kindness of Kyoko and Haru, but their concerns continue to grow. Urged by Reborn and Kyoko, Tsuna decides to check up on Chrome. Chrome opens the door for Tsuna, but when Gokudera comes near, she immediately closes it again. Alone in her room, Chrome stays tucked in her futon. But inside her heart, something is beginning to change. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 並盛の休日
Namimori Holiday
Namimori no Kyuujitsu
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends set off ten years in the future at the wish of Kyoko. Kyoko and her girlfriends seem to be concerned about their homes. Tsuna takes to heart Reborn’s warning never to forget that this is the world of ten years later, and he follows the girls. After walking around town, Ryohei and Kyoko head to their respective homes, and Tsuna and Bianchi decide to go with Haru to her house. However, when they get there, they see that all of the shutters are closed and no one appears to be home. When they ring the doorbell, there is no answer. Does a harsh reality await them in the world of ten years later? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心強い仲間
Inspiring Allies
Kokorozuyoi Nakama
episode.summary: The guardians are entrusted with the Vongola Box that the Tsuna from ten years later prepared. Tsuna and his friends refrained from battling Byakuran, and they receive a message of encouragement from the Varia of ten years later. However, they have been weakened in strength and spirit from the successive battles they have fought, and they are only able to light a small fire. Reborn sees this and orders them to rest. Tsuna and his friends retreat to the Vongola hideout, and just when they get settled, the radar suddenly catches suspicious activity. The radar indicates Tsuna’s home as the place in question. Is the offender working for the Millefore? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボンゴレ匣(ボックス), 修業開始
Vongola Box, Training Begins
Vongola Box, Shugyou Kaishij
episode.summary: Dino begins the Vongola Box training. Reborn holds an even higher position than Dino, watching over everyone as the “Tutor Fairy". But he tells Tsuna that he’s all alone until he can figure out how to properly open his box. Tsuna can’t hide his embarrassment, and when he goes to Yamamoto, he is just told to wait. According to Dino, the one person who truly understands Yamamoto’s potential is making a move. Who is this person exactly? Additionally, Kyoko and Haru decide to act on their own. What are they setting out to do? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖! アジト大騒動
Terror! Turmoil on Base
Kyoufu! Ajito Oosawagi
episode.summary: Dino comes from the to the Vongola Base. Seeing the gallant Dino atop his Box Weapon, Cavallo Alato, makes everyone realize the what a difference a decade makes. It seems Reborn wanted everyone to wait until the following day to begin their Box Weapon training because he wanted Dino’s help. But without his assistant Romario around, Dino is as inept as he always has been. Dino brought with him a special box for their training, but it ends up being the source of a big scare at the Vongola Base… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大空のボンゴレ匣(ボックス)
The Sky Vongola Box
Oozora no Vongola Box
episode.summary: Reborn finally gives them permission to start their Vongola Box training. However, due to some necessary preparations, they are not allowed to use their Vongola Boxes until the following day. Tsuna and his friends are told to take a break for the time being, so they all go to their own rooms. Tsuna stares at his box and turns his thoughts toward its content. When he lights a flame on his ring, the box responds by starting to move. Tsuna can’t believe his eyes, but the box is certainly responding to the flame. Tsuna is so curious that he finds himself opening his Vongola Box. Accompanied by an intense light, Tsuna’s Box Weapon is…. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エアーバイク
Airbike
Airbike
episode.summary: What Giannini showed Tsuna and his friends was an Airbike fueled by Deathperation Flames. This bike runs on similar principles as the hovercraft, and it is supposedly part of Tsuna’s collection in the future. Reborn thinks Tsuna and his friends have fully recovered, both physically and psychologically, so they begin intensive training on how to ride the Airbike. However, Tsuna is taken back by the new machinery and he shows fear. He confesses that he had used training wheels on his bicycle until he was in the fifth grade, whining that there is no way he would be able to ride such a bike, but…. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チョイス開始
Choice Begins
Choice Kaishi
episode.summary: The gang’s flame pressure is greater than Byakuran had expected, and they are all granted permission to participate in the Choice game. Countless cards fall from Byakuran’s giant head. Byakuran explains that each one of them must choose one of these cards at random to determine a battlefield. He goes on to explain that in this game, the conditions of the battle are chosen by each person’s luck. Giannini is nervous about picking a card from their enemy’s set, but Irie assures them that Byakuran would never cheat in Choice. Persuaded by his friends to go on and choose a card, Tsuna picks one of the cards… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦の日
Day of the Battle
Kessen no Hi
episode.summary: The Vongola Box training is done, and they just have to make their way to the spot Byakuran had chosen. Reborn has suits made for the gang with Leon’s flame-resistant thread. These black suits are the Vongola’s uniform. Irie reminds Tsuna and the others that the future of the world depends on this battle. But the future of the world is a bit overwhelming to grasp, so Reborn tells Tsuna and his friends to just focus on fighting to bring peace back to Namimori. The gang heads off to the battle, motivated by Reborn’s words. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 同じ心で
With the Same Heart
Onaji Kokoro de
episode.summary: Tsuna finally gives in and tells Kyoko and Haru everything. He tells them about the Vongola Family, about Byakuran, and about their upcoming battle. When Tsuna finishes explaining, Haru stays strong and just gives Tsuna a smile. But later, when she’s alone, Haru thinks about the burden everyone had been carrying and she begins to cry at her uselessness. Tsuna had told the girls without consulting the others, and he is worried that they won’t forgive him. Just then, someone hacks into the HQ’s communication system, and the person who appears on the screen is Byakuran! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボイコット宣言
Boycott Declared
Boycott Sengen
episode.summary: Tsuna and his crew have had enough with the training. Tsuna is still unable to open his box, and the others are worn out from the damage done by Lambo’s Box Weapon. On top of that, Kyoko and Haru ask Tsuna and the others to share the secret they’ve been keeping from the girls. Reborn pretends to not know anything because he doesn’t want to tell the girls anything about the Mafia or Byakuran. But the girls are adamant, and they decide to boycott all household chores until they are informed. Keeping up with their training is hard enough, and now Tsuna and the other guys will have to start cooking and cleaning themselves… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 因縁の対決
Fateful Showdown
Innen to Taiketsu
episode.summary: Tsuna draws on the First Generation Vongola, Mantello di Vongola Primo’s self-defense mode to nullify Torikabuto’s attack. He uses the Sky “harmony factor” to harmonize Torikabuto’s sea snake with the surrounding buildings, thereby turning it into stone. After that, Tsuna punches Torikabuto and knocks him down to the ground. The Vongola side gets excited about this win, but it doesn’t matter how many people you beat—the game doesn’t end unless you defeat the target. Yamamoto braces himself to attack the target, and just then, his fated enemy appears before him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天空ライオンVer.V.｢レオネ・ディ・チェーリバージョンボンゴレ｣
Sky Lion: Leone di Cielo ver. Vongola.
Tenkuu Lion ver. V. "Leone di Cieli ver. Vongolae"
episode.summary: In the battle at hand, they decide to implement the “target rule.” With this rule, the opposing teams each choose one person to be a target. Whichever team first defeats that target wins. Irie and Daisy are both chosen as targets. They wear target marks on their chests from which they can fire Deathperation Flames. Deathperation Flames are pure life energy. Even if the two targets are not directly hit by their enemies, using too much of their Deathperation Flames could lead to their death as well. Tsuna and the others are apprehensive, but Byakuran tells them with a cold smile that whoever’s Deathperation Flames first go out is the loser. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チョイス決着
Choice Ends
Choice Kecchaku
episode.summary: Irie and Spanner start up the base unit and try to escape as Kikyo draws near. They decide that the best thing to do right then is to escape, at least until Yamamoto defeats the opponents’ target, Daisy. However, the enemy’s base unit is guarded by a sturdy barrier, and they can’t get through. And Tsuna is still unable to break free of Torikabuto’s illusory space. Gokudera races over to hold Kikyo back, but without his Box Weapon, he is unable to stop her from breaking through into their base unit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 桔梗強襲
Kikyo`s Assault
Kikyou Kyoushuu
episode.summary: Now that Tsuna has defeated the Torikabuto and Yamamoto has defeated the Phantom Knight, the group decides to go directly after the opponents’ target. Daisy is frightened, and Kikyo tells her that she has been pretending to be in a pinch just to entertain Byakuran. The real six Funeral Wreaths have yet to give it their all. Just then, Tsuna’s contacts’ navigation system goes awry. In the meantime, Kikyo swiftly destroys their decoy and moves closer to Irie. The real six Funeral Wreaths are surging forward to catch up! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リベンジ
Revenge
Revenge
episode.summary: When he sees Yamamoto’s Box Weapon, the Phantom Knight makes the Hell Ring eat his soul to double his fighting power. Kyoko and Haru tremble with fear when they see the Phantom Knight transformed into a skeleton, but Yamamoto remains confident. The Phantom Knight loses all sense of reason and turns very vicious. Yamamoto repeatedly counters the Phantom Knight’s sword and illusion attacks with tranquility factor rain flames. Then, he brings out Shigure Soen Ryu Secret xx. Will Yamamoto be able to take revenge using the Shigure Soen Ryu he inherited from his father? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未来の真相
The Truth About the Future
Mirai no Shinsou
episode.summary: Despite suffering a bad wound from Kikyo’s attacks, Irie desperately tries to fight back. He doesn’t even stop after their loss in Choice is declared. Tsuna sees his desperation and asks why he is so determined to defeat Byakuran. Irie responds by starting to speak about his relationship with Byakuran—something he has never talked about before. It all started ten years ago, when the young Irie and Lambo met, and Irie got the Ten-Year Bazooka’s bullet. Using the Ten-Year Bazooka’s bullet, the young Irie time-traveled to the future where he met Byakuran. There, something that Irie did made Byakuran realize his powers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦いの後
After the Battle
Tatakai no Ato
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends somehow make it back to Namimori Town with the Teleportation System. Not only has the system been damaged, but Byakuran and the real six Funeral Wreaths are merely being delayed, and they’ll be after Tsuna and the gang any moment. Until then, they have to find a way to protect Yuni and win against Byakuran. Tsuna and his friends rest for a bit to calm down. Reborn explains what’s been going on in detail to Lal, who stayed at the Vongola base, and he insinuates that he has a secret plan to increase everyone’s power. It seems like Reborn isn’t the only one who’s in on this… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脱出
Escape
Dashutsu
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends try to break out of the Choice battlefield by firing flames at the Teleportation System. Hibari uses his Cloud Hedgehog to hold up the enemy, and Gokudera and Squalo back him up. Right when Dino is using his whole body to try to stop Byakuran, Mukuro from ten years in the future arrives, having used Real Illusions and wielding Chrome’s trident! The future Mukuro resists Byakuran with his powerful illusions. Mukuro says many puzzling things to Tsuna, including an order to never hand the Sky Arcobaleno, Yuni, over to Byakuran. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ユニ光臨
Yuni Comes
Yuni Kourin
episode.summary: Upon hearing Irie tell his story, Tsuna becomes fully aware of just how important their battle was. They lost the battle that was their only hope of defeating Byakuran. While Tsuna is in despair, Byakuran comes to steal their Vongola Rings as if to hit him while he’s down. Will the 7³ Policy fall into Byakuran’s hands? Irie brings up a promise from the past, and he asks to play another game of Choice. Byakuran claims they never made such a promise, but just then, an unexpected visitor appears before them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激しき雷撃
Furious Bolt of Lightning
Gekishiki Raigeki
episode.summary: It’s Lambo’s turn to take his succession test, which takes place at an amusement park. The first generation Lightning Guardian, Lampo, is very lazy, and he decides on an extremely random task. He says he will deem Lambo worthy of inheriting his power if he can complete the stamp rally in the park and make it back to Lampo. The crew thinks this should be an easy task to clear, but Lambo gets completely absorbed in the attractions at the park and forgets about his succession test. But the amusement park feels a little weird. Reborn and the rest of the crew begin to think that Lambo’s tutor, Verde, who has yet to show up at all, has something to do with it… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨の守護者の使命
The Duty of the Guardian of Rain
Ame no Shugosha no Shimei
episode.summary: Although Yamamoto won against the first generation Rain Guardian, Asari Ugetsu, he ended up being disqualified. Yamamoto is shocked. The rest of the crew doesn’t understand why he was disqualified, though Asari Ugetsu says that Tsuna should know why. Tsuna thinks about it but can’t quite figure it out. Yamamoto is hard on himself and becomes even more depressed. Then, Colonnello says that Yamamoto must solve this problem himself or it will have been for naught. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 継承・開始
Inheritance Begins
Keishou Kaishi
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends still have no clue what will be on the first generation’s succession test, but the Arcobaleno all start tutoring the crew in their own ways. Colonnello makes plans to toughen up Yamamoto, while Fong decides to first observe Gokudera’s personality. Skull is getting nowhere, and it seems Mammon hasn’t gotten anything done yet. Even worse is Verde, who hasn’t even shown his face. Will they be okay at this rate? While Tsuna and his friends are stressing about the test, the first generation Guardian of the Rain Ring, Asari Ugetsu appears before them! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: I世(プリーモ)ファミリー来る!
The Primo Family Arrives!
Primo Family Kiru!
episode.summary: Reborn disappears after telling Tsuna and the others to bring Yuni and meet him back in front of Irie’s device. Tsuna and his friends are flung ten years into the past to Namimori. They see that Reborn has brought the Arcobaleno and realize they were brought to the past to be tutored by the Arcobaleno. But what exactly are they going to do? Just then, with the power of Yuni’s prayers and the Arcobaleno’s pacifiers, Vongola Primo appears out of the Vongola Ring! The first generation Vongola Family begins to evaluate whether Tsuna and the gang are worthy of succeeding the Vongola Family’s true powers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仕掛けられた罠
Set Trap
Shikakerareta Wana
episode.summary: Chrome and Tsuna are the only ones left to take their inheritance succession tests. But Tsuna hears from Kyoko and Haru that Chrome is nowhere to be found. Worried, Tsuna and his friends make their way to Kokuyo Land to see what is going on. The gang runs into Ken and Chikusa along the way, who say that Chrome is back but acting strange. They rush over to Chrome, who bursts into tears and says she doesn’t want to fight anymore. Tsuna feels bad for having dragged her into some tough situations, but he doesn’t quite know what to say to her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 晴のち曇
Sunny Then Cloudy
Hare Nochi Kumori
episode.summary: Skull arrives on a giant fighter aircraft to try to convince Hibari, but he fails and starts randomly shooting missiles in desperation. But Hibari attacks with his Box Weapon, Cloud Hedgehog, and makes a hole in Skull’s aircraft. Air starts leaking out of the aircraft, and it slowly begins to fall. It looks like it’s going to fall right onto Namimori Middle School! Even Hibari freezes up, but the man wielding Sun Flames makes a move! What will become of Hibari’s inheritance succession test? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 孤高の浮雲
Aloof Cloud
Kokou no Ukigumo
episode.summary: There are three remaining succession tests. Ryohei is raring to take his test, but Hibari’s turn comes before his. But when the Cloud Guardian Alaude tells Hibari that the succession test is not a battle, Hibari loses all interest. The rest of the crew tries to motivate Hibari, but Hibari is being difficult. Just then, Ryohei says he’ll take care of it as the eldest of the group and furiously starts trying to convince Hibari. Ryohei doesn’t give up, no matter how many times Hibari brushes him off. And then, finally, Hibari gets so irritated that he takes out his Tonfa! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 静かなる嵐
Silent Storm
Shizuka Naru Arashi
episode.summary: Yamamoto’s and Lambo’s tests are finished, and Gokudera starts getting impatient for his turn. Fong tells him to calm down, but Gokudera doesn’t want to hear that. In order to prepare for his upcoming succession test, Gokudera opens his Box Weapon to train with Uri, but Uri is disobedient as usual and runs away. While Gokudera is running around looking for Uri, another Gokudera appears before Fong! When Tsuna and his friends see the person pretending to be Gokudera, they sense that something is out of place, but then their super intuition is sealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏切りの記憶
Betraying Memory
Uragiri no Kioku
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends are trapped and forced to fight illusory opponents that look exactly like them. These illusions have Daemon’s voice and reflect his intentions, and they attack the gang to try to change them to match Daemon Spade’s ideal. His ideal Vongola Family is a mafia organization with the powerful ability to control and take over the enemy and keep growing stronger. Will Tsuna and his friends be able to win against Daemon Spade and stand firm in their convictions? In the middle of the battle, Daemon Spade tells them about his act of betrayal… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幻惑の霧
Bewitching Mist
Genwaku no Kiri
episode.summary: Kyoko and Haru are taken hostage as part of the first-generation Guardian of the Mist Ring, Daemon Spade’s scheme. He had been spying on Tsuna and his friends for a while now, and he determined that Kyoko and Haru could be valuable hostages. What exactly does Daemon Spade want from the gang? And why would a member of the first-generation Family do such a terrible thing? Tsuna and his friends are confused, but Daemon Spade begins to speak to them with a confident grin on his face. He says that he would free his hostages if Tsuna and the others became the ideal Vongola inheritors. What could Daemon Spade’s true intention be? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真6弔花(リアルろくちょうか)襲来
The Real Six Funeral Wreaths Attack!
Real Roku Chouka Shuurai
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends are nervous about when the real six Funeral Wreaths would come after them. The Flame Ring Teleportation System had been damaged, but it’s not completely destroyed. Giannini and Spanner are closely observing the base’s security system. Meanwhile, Hibari and Dino are keeping watch at Nami Middle. And Squalo uses the base’s communication system to seek the Varia’s support. Just then, the Flame Ring Teleportation System appears in the sky, accompanied by some ominous sounds. Six lights scatter upon Namimori Town. The real six Funeral Wreaths finally arrive! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ファミリーの覚悟
The Family`s Resolve
Family no Kakugo
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends successfully obtain their inheritance, and they go back to the future. Yuni and Reborn are there to take back the pacifier they had left with Lal. Reborn tells Lal all about what Tsuna and the gang went through in their succession tests. But through all the adversity, Tsuna and his friends were able to embody their roles as Vongola Decimo and his Guardians. As a result, the gang was not only able to obtain their inheritance, but also strengthen the bond of the group and prepare themselves in face of the battles ahead. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: I世(プリーモ)の意志
Primo`s Will
Primo no Ishi
episode.summary: Daemon Spade continues to show a will to fight even when he is under pressure from Tsuna and the gang. He insists on a one-on-one fight against Tsuna. While fighting, Daemon explains how he feels about the Vongola Family. Tsuna listens to him, and while he defends himself against Daemon’s attacks, he does not go on the offense. Gokudera can’t bear to watch any longer, and he tries to back Tsuna up. But Reborn stops him and says that this is the boss’s fight, and they must not get involved. The Guardians hold their breaths and watch from the sidelines. Tsuna continues to endure Daemon’s attacks and then speaks of his unchanging conviction… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 修羅開匣(かいこう)
Open Carnage Box
Shura Kaikou
episode.summary: Tsuna and his friends run into Mr. Kawahira. Mr. Kawahira is a regular at the ramen shop where I-Pin works ten years in the future. Tsuna and the gang remember hearing his name from the future I-Pin when she arrived using the Ten-Year Bazooka. For some reason, Mr. Kawahira knows about the real six Funeral Wreaths, and he tells the gang that he will give them refuge. It all seems kind of suspicious, but Tsuna and his friends decide to take Mr. Kawahira up on his offer. Meanwhile, at Namimori Middle, the battle between Daisy, Dino, and Hibari gets off to a start! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アラウディの手錠
Alaude`s Handcuffs
Alaude no Tejou
episode.summary: Hibari’s Vongola Box Weapon is shaped like handcuffs. Daisy is surprised to see a Vongola Box Weapon for the first time. The real six Funeral Wreaths know about Tsuna and the gang’s special attacks because Byakuran provided them with information from the parallel worlds. However, the Vongola Boxes only exist in this world, so they have not obtained any information on them. But Daisy laughs and says these weapons are very suitable for him. What does he mean by that? Tsuna and his friends are hiding at Kawahira Real Estate, and when Dino stops corresponding from Nami Middle, they find themselves completely in the dark about the battle going on there. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: D(デイモン)・スペードの魔レンズ
Daemon Spade`s Devil Lens
Daemon Spade no Ma Lens
episode.summary: Gamma rescues Yuni, who was captured by Torikabuto. Despite having fought Gokudera and the others as leader of the Millefiore, Gamma is now here only for the sake of protecting his boss, Yuni. Even Nosaru and Tazaru are happy to serve Yuni in combat. But Gamma can’t exercise his full power potential because his Mare Ring was stolen. Gamma still puts himself on the line and does everything within his power to protect Yuni. Torikabuto draws near to Gamma and Yuni, and just then, Tsuna appears before them! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦開始
The Final Battle Begins
Kessen Kaishi
episode.summary: Byakuran orders that Ghost, the last of the real six Funeral Wreaths, be released from Vindice’s prison. But when Iris comes to get Ghost, Vindice says that he has already been released, and he shows her a video of a different man being released. Who is this man who deceived the fearsome Vindice and was set free instead of Ghost? Meanwhile, Tsuna and his friends hide in the forest at Yuni’s suggestion. Gokudera seems to have gotten hurt pretty bad ly. Then, when dawn is about to break, Yuni predicts that their final battle is about to start. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Gの弓矢(アーチェリー)
G`s Archery
G no Archery
episode.summary: Kikyo and his comrades planned to surround the Vongola and attack from three corners, but when he hears an explosion from somewhere in the forest, he stops advancing for the moment. Kikyo says the battle has begun, but he looks pretty confident as he gazes in the direction of the explosion. He thinks the Vongola will have no chance of winning once Zakuro starts fighting for real. Gokudera is extremely worn out from fighting, but then he sees Zakuro in action and is absolutely astonished by Zakuro’s power. Gokudera has strengthened his resolve up until now, but will he be able to come through in this battle? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ランポウの盾(シールド)
Lampo`s Shield
Lampo no Shield
episode.summary: With the help of Uri, Gokudera hits Zakuro with one solid attack. But just then, Bluebell shows up to fight him too! Gokudera doesn’t have the strength left in him to move, let alone fight another battle. As Bluebell is about to finish him off, Gokudera gets backup from someone unexpected. Meanwhile, Kikyo comes to the marsh where Ryohei, Basil, Lambo, Nosaru, and Tazaru are hiding. These battles between the Millefiore and Vongola will require a lot from everyone involved! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナックルの極限(マキシマム)ブレイク
Knuckle`s Maximum Break
Knuckle no Maximum Break
episode.summary: Lambo employs his Vongola Box’s power to defeat Kikyo’s Box Weapon, Nuvola Velociraptor. But Lambo, exhausted from exerting himself, falls asleep soon after, and Kikyo takes this opportunity to get back at him by opening his Carnage Box! The intensification of the Cloud flames spawns countless Spinosaurus heads. Basil, Nosaru, and Tazaru cannot possibly take all of them on. Just then, Ryohei stands up and announces that he will beat Kikyo in three minutes—the equivalent of a boxing round. The time has come for Ryohei to exercise his Vongola Box’s power! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新しい未来へ
To a New Future
Atarashii Mirai e
episode.summary: The long battle in the future finally comes to an end. However, the group has suffered some major losses. Tsuna begins to have doubts that this devastating battle was as important as he had thought. Just then, the Arcobaleno comes up with a way to bring everything back to normal with the information they received from Yuni’s flames. With this solution, Byakuran’s evil doings would be erased from the past. Not only that, the past in which people perished at the hands of Byakuran would be changed so that their lives would not be lost. A new past would be born, and it would lead to a brighter future. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 「海」「貝」「虹」
Sea. Clam. Rainbow.
Umi Kai Niji
episode.summary: Byakuran is surprised at Vongola Primo’s unexpected visit. Apparently, his arrival could not be foreseen even with Byakuran’s access to parallel worlds. Yuni explains to Byakuran why Vongola Primo has come. The reason has something to do with the Sky elements of the 73 policy. Vongola Primo says that he is there to unleash them. He seems to be referring to the Vongola rings, but will this provide Tsuna the opportunity to power up? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全てが大事な時間
Precious Moments in Time
Subete ga Daiji na Jikan
episode.summary: Tsuna is almost crushed by Byakuran’s power. The two of them keep firing back at each other with increasingly bigger Deathperation Flames. Then, out of nowhere, Tsuna’s and Byakuran’s rings begin to resonate very loudly. Yuni is in hiding far away from them, but her pacifier starts to fire Deathperation Flames and make the same noise as well. Reborn thinks that the Sky elements are contacting one another. Yuni floats up into the air, and she is taken in the direction of Byakuran and Tsuna against her will. Yuni seems to be headed for danger. What is happening?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 欲望に満ちた大空
Sky Full of Desire
Yokubou ni Michita Oozora
episode.summary: The battle between Tsuna’s Deathperation Point Zero Revised and Ghost comes to an end, but something doesn’t seem right. Tsuna absorbed Ghost’s flames, but his own flame power has not increased at all. Where did all of Ghost’s flame energy go? Finally, Byakuran arrives on the scene! But the guardians and the Varia are too exhausted after Ghost took their flame energy. Just then, the extent of Ghost’s true power is shown at the hands of Byakuran! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: GHOST覚醒
Ghost Awakens
Ghost Kakusei
episode.summary: The last real six Funeral Wreath, Ghost, finally arrives when things are most intense. His body is twice the size of a normal person, and it radiates light as though it is electrically charged. He also looks identical to Byakuran. Everyone is astonished by the sight of this unexpected last Funeral Wreath, and even Kikyo seems rattled. Gokudera, Basil, and Ryohei launch a preemptive strike with an attack that combines all of their Box Weapons! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の真(リアル)6弔花
The Last Real Funeral Wreath
Saigo no Real 6 Chouka
episode.summary: The battle between the Varia and the duo Zakuro and Bluebell is only getting more intense. Tsuna, who can only worry from afar, begins to sense that something terrible has happened. Reborn doesn’t help his angst when he says that the Varia may be strong, but their chances against the superhuman real six Funeral Wreaths are slim. Over at the scene of the battle, the Varia are indeed struggling against the real six Funeral Wreaths. Bel, Levi, and Lussuria have been captured by one of Bluebell’s attacks, and even Xanxus is hit by Kikyo’s Spinosaurus. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボンゴレファミリー総登場! ボンゴレ式修学旅行, 来る!!
Jump Super Anime Tour 2009: Vongola-Style School Trip! The Complete Memory
Vongola Family Soutoujou! Vongola Shiki Shuugakuryokou, Kuru!
『家庭教師ヒットマンREBORN!』×『エルドライブ【ēlDLIVE】』SPコラボミニアニメ[24H]
Katekyo Hitman Reborn! x elDLIVE Special Collaboration
ミスターリボックのちゃおちゃおインタビュー vol.3
Mr. Rebokku`s Final Ciao Ciao Interview with Yamamoto, Squalo, Byakuran and Mukuro
ミスターリボックのちゃおちゃおインタビュー vol.2
Mr. Rebokku`s Ciao Ciao Interview with Dino, Belphegor and Hibari
ミスターリボックのちゃおちゃおインタビュー vol.1
Mr. Rebokku`s Ciao Ciao Interview with Tsuna, Gokudera and Xanxus
